title: Small dodecahemidodecahedron
summary: In geometry, the small dodecahemidodecahedron is a nonconvex uniform polyhedron, indexed as U51. It has 18 faces (12 pentagons and 6 decagons), 60 edges, and 30 vertices.[1] Its vertex figure alternates two regular pentagons and decagons as a crossed quadrilateral.
